titleStmt.title: To the supreme authority of this nation in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of the Lord Major and Court of Aldermen of the Citie of London.
titleStmt.author: Sadler, John, 1615-1674.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: The petition is signed: J. Sadler.
Includes: The Parliaments answer declared by Mr. Speaker upon this petition.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
